snippet: Students all around the world have been preparing for the start of the school year this month, and what a start it has been, with protests and scandals in Hong Kong, in London, in the Ivy League.
abstract: Students all around the world have been preparing for the start of the school year this month, and what a start it has been, with protests and scandals in Hong Kong, in London, in the Ivy League.

headline.main: Hey, Teacher, Leave Those Kids Alone
